donor_name: ECONOMIC COMMUNITY OF WEST AFRICAN STATES
outputs.output_descr: A functional ECOWAS volunteer programme to be piloted initially in Guinea, Guinea Bissau, Liberia and Sierra Leone. Volunteers will be recruited from the 15 member states but no volunteer will serve in his/her own country.

project_descr: The Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS), a regional group of fifteen countries, signed a MOU with UNV in 2005 to request the support of UNV in establishing the ECOWAS Volunteer Programme .
